description: Primes p such that (p-3)/2 is an odd prime.
comments: Related to hyperperfect numbers of a certain form.
links: J. S. McCranie, A study of hyperperfect numbers, J. Int. Seqs. Vol. 3 (2000) #P00.1.3.
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = forprime(p=11, nn, if (isprime((p-3)/2), print1(p, ", "))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 11 2016
author: _Jud McCranie_
